Best Defense.name: Best Defense
Best Defense.description: Sometimes the best defense is a good offense! Make a shield bash Strike, or a Strike with a weapon with the attached to shield trait. As long as your Strike wasn't a critical failure, you can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.xjGwis0uaC2305pm]{Raise your Shield} as a free action.

Crash Together.name: Crash Together
Crash Together.description:
Trigger Your Castling Crashers partner attempts to move through your space

Effect You move with your ally. You Stride up to half your Speed in the same direction as your ally.

Effect: Affliction Mithridatism.name: Effect: Affliction Mithridatism
Effect: Affliction Mithridatism.description:
Depending on your result and choice, you either:

  • become immune to a chosen affliction,

  • gain a +4 circumstance bonus to saves against the chosen affliction,

  • or gain resistance equal to your level against the damage the chosen poison or affliction would deal.

Effect: Can't Stop, Won't Stop.name: Effect: Can't Stop, Won't Stop
Effect: Can't Stop, Won't Stop.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.1VT95tETP9FBKDTU]{Can't Stop, Won't Stop}

You gain a status bonus to a save of your choice equal to the value of your wounded condition. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.misc.Item.g92q06HvQQvyj445]{Still Standing} bold reaction.

Effect: Establish Etiquette.name: Effect: Establish Etiquette
Effect: Establish Etiquette.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.hOZcktZvOn2aWQp9]{Establish Etiquette}

Each turn the creature does not follow the established etiquette, it takes a -1 circumstance penalty to its attack rolls, or a -2 circumstance penalty if you critically succeeded at your Society check. If it follows the established etiquette, it gains a +1 circumstance bonus on its attack rolls until its next turn or it breaks etiquette (immediately gaining the penalties again if it does). The creature can choose to prematurely end your Establish Etiquette by spending a single action with the auditory or concentrate trait to deny your appeal to etiquette.

You and your allies must choose to follow the established etiquette when you take actions against the creature, and if you do not follow the established etiquette against the creature the effect immediately ends and all creatures who witnessed you or your allies do so are temporarily immune to your Establish Etiquette for 1 day.

10 Paces You choose to only make Strikes with ranged weapons, and only within their first range increment.

Dishonorable Striking You choose to ignore circumstance penalties to AC.

Hands Alone You choose to only make Strikes with non-stance unarmed attacks.

No Words You choose not to use auditory or linguistic actions.

One Handed You choose to keep a hand free.

Right of Way You choose to take exactly one action with the move trait each turn.

Solo Fight You choose not to attack creatures that were attacked by another creature this round.

Effect: Endorsing Jingle.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.oEneKAAytmKfvawK]{Endorsing Jingle}

You take a -2 circumstance penalty to Performance checks.
Effect: Endorsing Jingle.name: Effect: Endorsing Jingle

Effect: Give Offerings.name: Effect: Give Offerings
Effect: Give Offerings.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.DQeBdmEuorx9aXkC]{Give Offerings}

You gain a +1 status bonus to your first non-trivial relgion check.

Effect: Harden Heart.name: Effect: Harden Heart
Effect: Harden Heart.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.1uaBJa7Vzw9Mz32r]{Harden Heart}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saves against emotion effects. If you are legendary in Survival this bonus is +3 instead.

Effect: Hypersenses.name: Effect: Hypersenses
Effect: Hypersenses.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.QhsW8mRh4mPh9Zkr]{Hypersenses}

Choose one of the following senses to gain access to.

  • Hearing as a precise sense with a range of 20 feet.

  • Scent as an imprecise sense with a range of 30 feet or as a precise sense out to 20 feet if you already had scent as an imprecise sense.

  • Tremorsense as an imprecise sense out to 30 feet.

  • Wavesense as an imprecise sense out to 30 feet.

Effect: Interlocked Shields.name: Effect: Interlocked Shields
Effect: Interlocked Shields.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.KjJxeCtiQrf6FQOm]{Interlocked Shields}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC, or your circumstance bonus from your raised shield increases by 1.

Effect: Off-Handed Insult.name: Effect: Off-Handed Insult
Effect: Off-Handed Insult.description: You take a -2 status penalty to the triggering skill check to end a Bon Mot effect caused by the origin of the Bon Mot.

Effect: On Borrowed Time.name: Effect: On Borrowed Time
Effect: On Borrowed Time.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.govJQSn153dTqcVP]{On Borrowed Time}

You gain 60 temporary hit points.

Effect: Opening Accompaniment.name: Effect: Opening Accompaniment
Effect: Opening Accompaniment.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.kGTx0Ri0Rx5IPpXJ]{Opening Accompaniment}

You gain a +2 status bonus to your initiative (or +1 on a success, or -4 on a critical failure).

Effect: Peace with Death.name: Effect: Peace with Death
Effect: Peace with Death.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.Mkd7Qhph9eP9g1tz]{Peace with Death}

Reduce the DC of recovery checks by 5. When you regain Hit Points, you gain additional healing equal to your level (or half your level on a success).

Effect: Pick on Someone Your Own Size.name: Effect: Pick on Someone Your Own Size
Effect: Pick on Someone Your Own Size.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.YOvnL7QRWU3x2lgZ]{Pick on Someone Your Own Size}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.lOE4yjUnETTdaf2T]{Reposition}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} against creatures @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL] by your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} if they are larger than you.

Effect: Pinpoint Out.name: Effect: Pinpoint Out
Effect: Pinpoint Out.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.KLiIDI6iio7WbllX]{Pinpoint Out}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to perception.

Effect: Primary Threat.name: Effect: Primary Threat
Effect: Primary Threat.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.N6qvXuLkwxSRezt3]{Primary Threat}

You take a -1 circumstance penalty to attacks against targets other than the originating actor.

Effect: Quick Cuisine.name: Effect: Quick Cuisine
Effect: Quick Cuisine.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.u1Yj7NCED4myTRDu]{Quick Cuisine}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your next fortitude save (or a +2 circumstance bonus if the effect would inflict the sickened condition. On a failure you instead take a -2 circumstance penalty). On a critical success you gain temporary hit points equal to half the level plus the intelligence modifier of this effect's origin.

Effect: Restricting Flora.name: Effect: Restricting Flora
Effect: Restricting Flora.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.3bCe2MXk8ik73eWP]{Restricting Flora}

You take a -5-foot status penalty to your Speed (-10 on a critical success).

Effect: Revitalizing Grove.name: Effect: Revitalizing Grove
Effect: Revitalizing Grove.description: You gain fast healing for a minute while you're in the revitalizing grove.

Effect: Skin of my Teeth.name: Effect: Skin of my Teeth
Effect: Skin of my Teeth.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.CHOcmC4rmDAYTUWX]{Skin of my Teeth}

Increase the triggering shield's Hardness by 2. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.misc.Item.lZdH7vYrwuAuCovT]{Best Defense} action.

Effect: Slope Slide.name: Effect: Slope Slide
Effect: Slope Slide.description: You gain a circumstance bonus to your melee Strike against a creature.

Effect: Spiritual Memories (Master).name: Effect: Spiritual Memories (Master)
Effect: Spiritual Memories (Master).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.4ZmVTOG4s65NXB6E]{Spiritual Memories}

Choose one skill you are at least trained in, you become master in that skill.

Effect: Spiritual Memories (Trained).name: Effect: Spiritual Memories (Trained)
Effect: Spiritual Memories (Trained).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.4ZmVTOG4s65NXB6E]{Spiritual Memories}

Choose one skill, you become trained in that skill.

Effect: The End Times are Coming!.name: Effect: The End Times are Coming!
Effect: The End Times are Coming!.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.ISkhd8FXFM31Di2Z]{The End Times are Coming!}

You gain a +1 status bonus to your next hostile action against the origin of this effect.

Effect: Warrior's Rally.name: Effect: Warrior's Rally
Effect: Warrior's Rally.description: You gain a status bonus to your next attack roll, after which this effect immediately ends.

Effect: Wrathful Protector.name: Effect: Wrathful Protector
Effect: Wrathful Protector.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.SrgRgADZEd2PAUHB]{Wrathful Protector}

You gain a +4 status bonus to damage against the marked enemy. If you are at least 16th level, the status bonus increases to +6. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.misc.Item.jnNObtugln5yFMjo]{Furious Response} bold activity.

Effect: Wrathful Protector (Temporary HP.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.SrgRgADZEd2PAUHB]{Wrathful Protector}

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to half your level. This additionally grants @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.misc.Item.1Byt0JWIVk6ijxE2]{Effect: Wrathful Protector}.
Effect: Wrathful Protector (Temporary HP.name: Effect: Wrathful Protector (Temporary HP)

Feral Lunge.name: Feral Lunge
Feral Lunge.description: You launch yourself at a foe viciously. You Stride towards an enemy and then @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{Leap} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.JUvAvruz7yRQXfz2]{Long Jump} towards them. If you end this movement within melee reach, you can make a melee Strike with a non-fist unarmed attack and you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your attack roll.

Furious Response.name: Furious Response
Furious Response.description:
You advance on the enemy that wronged your ally. You can choose to Stride or Strike thrice, choosing between Stride or Strike for each of your three choices. Your Strides must be towards the required enemy of Wrathful Protector and your Strikes must be against this same enemy.

Alternatively, you can Cast a Spell that deals damage that would take 3 actions or less to cast instead of Striding or Striking thrice. If you choose to Cast a Spell that takes 2-actions or less to cast, you can use a 1-action spellshape you have access to before you Cast the Spell as part of your Furious Response. The spell must target the required enemy or include them in its area of effect.

Pinpoint Assault.name: Pinpoint Assault
Pinpoint Assault.description:
Trigger You roll damage for a ranged Strike against the required enemy of Honed-Shot Precision

Effect You strike the very soul with your marksmanship. Roll damage twice and take the higher result of the two.

Spell Effect: Guidance (Murmured Prayer).name: Spell Effect: Guidance (Murmured Prayer)
Spell Effect: Guidance (Murmured Prayer).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.izcxFQFwf3woCnFs]{Guidance}

You have divine guidance, granting you a +2 status bonus to one attack roll, Perception check, saving throw, or skill check you attempt before the duration ends. You choose which roll to use the bonus on before rolling. If you use the bonus, the spell ends.

Twist from Harm.name: Twist from Harm
Twist from Harm.description:
Trigger You would take physical damage from an attack roll you had the circumstance bonus to AC against from Duck and Weave

Effect You lunge out of the way, minimizing the damage your body would take. You gain resistance to physical damage equal to half your level against the triggering attack.

Unleash Kaiju Strength.name: Unleash Kaiju Strength
Unleash Kaiju Strength.description:
Frequency once per day

Effect You allow a fraction of the power of the kaiju to escape you, causing devastating destruction to follow in your wake. You produce the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.x7SPrsRxGb2Vy2nu] in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:40] surrounding yourself. Your unarmed Strikes deal an additional 2d8 damage of an energy type associated with the kaiju whom you survived, and you gain resistance 10 to that energy type, for 1 minute.

Warding Protection.name: Warding Protection
Warding Protection.description:
Frequency Once per hour

Trigger A creature you warded is within 60 feet and attempts a saving throw against an effect with the trait you chose.

The warded creature gains a +2 circumstance bonus to the saving throw.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.misc.Item.nkcSWI8WJbv10kFy]{Effect: Warding Protection}

Who's Next?.name: Who's Next?
Who's Next?.description:
Requirements You reduced a creature to 0 Hit Points within the last turn and did not use the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.gjec0ts3wkFbjvHN]{You're Next} reaction

Effect You goad others after downing an enemy, daring others to cross you. All enemies within 30 feet of you that witnessed the required creature reduced to 0 Hit Points must attempt a @Check[will|against:intimidation] save against your Intimidation DC.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1} and can't reduce its frightened condition below 1 while they can see you.

Critical Failure As failure, except the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}. In addition, if the creature is your level or lower, it gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} condition for as long as it is frightened.

Activate Glyph.name: Activate Glyph
Activate Glyph.description:
Frequency Once per day

Requirements You have created two Scribe Teleportation Glyphs and are in physical contact with one of them

You activate the glyph, which has the effects of the teleport spell on all creatures standing in the glyph's space except the destination of the spell is the location of the other scribed teleportation glyph and there is no deviation from the intended destination.

Aura: Teacher's Aura.name: Aura: Teacher's Aura
Aura: Teacher's Aura.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.eMpnxZozr8UisFh5]{Bastion of Knowledge}

Allies within a 30 foot aura gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.misc.Item.UN7IXaYjVOhxOh1T]{Bastion's Guidance} reaction.

Bastion's Guidance.name: Bastion's Guidance
Bastion's Guidance.description:
Trigger You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge}

Effect Being in the presence of a bastion of knowledge allows you the ability to double-think. You roll the triggering check twice and use the better result. You are then immune to Bastion's Guidance for 10 minutes.

Effect: Become the Mask.name: Effect: Become the Mask
Effect: Become the Mask.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.p8xNxYZwMppiVw03]{Become the Mask}

You gain a +3 circumstance bonus to Impersonate and Lie (+2 on a success).

Effect: Breath Taker.name: Effect: Breath Taker
Effect: Breath Taker.description: You take a -1 circumstance penalty against inhaled and olfactory effects.

Effect: Contortionist's Escape.name: Effect: Contortionist's Escape
Effect: Contortionist's Escape.description: When attempting to Escape using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.ghbxxTEmDslXGt40]{Contortionist's Escape}, if you get a critical failure on either of these checks, you get a failure instead.

Effect: Deep Meditation.name: Effect: Deep Meditation
Effect: Deep Meditation.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.kjejKLqx7cFIlv9e]{Deep Meditation}

You gain a +3 circumstance bonus to Impersonate and Lie (+2 on a success).

Effect: Defensive Flight Maneuver.name: Effect: Defensive Flight Maneuver
Effect: Defensive Flight Maneuver.description: You either gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your AC until the beginning of your next turn, or increase the circumstance bonus from this effect by 1.

Effect: Delver's Intuition.name: Effect: Delver's Intuition
Effect: Delver's Intuition.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.Mkd7Qhph9eP9g1tz]{Peace with Death}

Reduce the DC of recovery checks by 5. When you regain Hit Points, you gain additional healing equal to your level (or half your level on a success).

Effect: Devastating Finish.name: Effect: Devastating Finish
Effect: Devastating Finish.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.QrDy2f0BYBWnzFCM]{Devastating Finish}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize}. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.misc.Item.UoIjmafqNeVuiKRc]{Who's Next?} bold action.

Effect: Disrupting Performance.name: Effect: Disrupting Performance
Effect: Disrupting Performance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.7u3zhB89hKYh9O6Q]{Disrupting Performance}

You take a -2 circumstance penalty to the triggering check (-3 on a critical success).

Effect: Echoing Earth.name: Effect: Echoing Earth
Effect: Echoing Earth.description: You gain 10 feet of imprecise tremorsense, or 20 feet if you're legendary in Nature.

Effect: Establish Etiquette (Dishonorabl.name: Effect: Establish Etiquette (Dishonorable Striking)
Effect: Establish Etiquette (Dishonorabl.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.hOZcktZvOn2aWQp9]{Establish Etiquette}

Ephemeral effect that suppressed circumstance penalties to AC.

Effect: Friends in High Places.name: Effect: Friends in High Places
Effect: Friends in High Places.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.i4bw2SfXHwelysBR]{Friends in High Places}

You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your reroll of the triggering roll.

Effect: Fortunate One.name: Effect: Fortunate One
Effect: Fortunate One.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.GUW5QqqC5wmLwiVY]{Fortunate One}

You gain a +1 status bonus to the next check you make.

Effect: Fungal Ward.name: Effect: Fungal Ward
Effect: Fungal Ward.description: You gain void resistance equal to half the origin's level against the first source of void damage you take.

Effect: Haughty Correction Critical Fail.name: Effect: Haughty Correction Critical Failure
Effect: Haughty Correction Critical Fail.description: You fumble your response and take a -2 circumstance penalty to Intelligence-based skill checks and Perception checks and DCs for 1 minute or until you spend a single action with the concentrate trait to regain your composure.

Effect: Honed-Shot Precision.name: Effect: Honed-Shot Precision
Effect: Honed-Shot Precision.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.NgBZh1OX80hX7OHA]{Honed-Shot Precision}

Your ranged Strikes deal 1 additional precision damage per weapon damage die against the marked enemy. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.misc.Item.Ig9HaamKNFhmhIYk]{Pinpoint Assault} bold reaction.

Effect: Illusory Infiltrator.name: Effect: Illusory Infiltrator
Effect: Illusory Infiltrator.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.lroFPG7RpQuAfOi9]{Illusory Infiltrator}

For every round you Hide or Sneak, you take a –1 circumstance penalty.

[[/act hide skill=arcana traits=concentrate,illusion]]

[[/act hide skill=occultism traits=concentrate,illusion]]

[[/act sneak skill=arcana traits=concentrate,illusion]]

[[/act sneak skill=occultism traits=concentrate,illusion]]

Effect: Liturgical Performance.name: Effect: Liturgical Performance
Effect: Liturgical Performance.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.IY3S7jaggi50IfUc]{Liturgical Performance}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your religion check if the audience favors your faith, or a -1 circumstance penalty if they oppose it.

Effect: Magical Feedback.name: Effect: Magical Feedback
Effect: Magical Feedback.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.0ScSmP7dkiE9a5uv]{Magical Feedback}

You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.misc.Item.BZizB3VFYoo6bGcs]{Evoke Surge} bold activity.

Effect: May They Abandon You!.name: Effect: May They Abandon You!
Effect: May They Abandon You!.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.Y5UZqvxm8PYjISIT]{May They Abandon You!}

You gain a +1 status bonus to the triggering check (Or a -1 status penalty on a failure. On a critical failure his penalty is -2).

Effect: Moonscarred.name: Effect: Moonscarred
Effect: Moonscarred.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.rT5WPDD7zcFMRfMQ]{Moonscarred}

You gain an imprecise sense of smell with a range of 30 feet, and temporary Hit Points equal to your level.

Effect: Ritual Glyphs.name: Effect: Ritual Glyphs
Effect: Ritual Glyphs.description:
You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to all primary and secondary checks while performing rituals, or increase the value of your circumstance bonus by 1.

If the origin is a master in Arcana, the circumstances bonuses applied increase by 2 instead of 1.

Effect: Savage Success.name: Effect: Savage Success
Effect: Savage Success.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.3hakMj2ZU7iSe1iu]{Savage Success}

Your non-fist melee unarmed Strikes gain a circumstance bonus to damage equal to the number of weapon damage dice. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.misc.Item.0sLZW5D6ziJY7yD0]{Feral Lunge} bold activity.

Effect: Seeking Spell.name: Effect: Seeking Spell
Effect: Seeking Spell.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.5GdNu5IBGAN9KhLV]{Seeking Spell}

Ephemeral effect. You reduce the circumstance bonus from cover by 2, to a minimum of 0.

Effect: Shallows' Sallow Shadows.name: Effect: Shallows' Sallow Shadows
Effect: Shallows' Sallow Shadows.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.9vL6eMCAwGYax0z0]{Shallows' Sallow Shadows}

You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against the ability identified by your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge}.

Effect: Spiritual Memories (Expert).name: Effect: Spiritual Memories (Expert)
Effect: Spiritual Memories (Expert).description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.4ZmVTOG4s65NXB6E]{Spiritual Memories}

Choose one skill, you become expert in that skill.

Effect: Sprint Count.name: Effect: Sprint Count
Effect: Sprint Count.description: Increase the counter on this effect to represent how many times you have used @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.Lsu7JP3zpS46SXOx]{Sprint} so far.

Effect: Teacher's Aura.name: Effect: Teacher's Aura
Effect: Teacher's Aura.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.eMpnxZozr8UisFh5]{Bastion of Knowledge}

You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.misc.Item.UN7IXaYjVOhxOh1T]{Bastion's Guidance} reaction.

Effect: Unleash Kaiju Strength.name: Effect: Unleash Kaiju Strength
Effect: Unleash Kaiju Strength.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.misc.Item.Ig8amOmlbl6VkzzK]{Unleash Kaiju Strength}

Your unarmed Strikes deal an additional 2d8 damage of an energy type associated with the kaiju whom you survived, and you gain resistance 10 to that energy type.

Effect: Ward the Sanctified.name: Effect: Ward the Sanctified
Effect: Ward the Sanctified.description:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-feats-plus.player-options.Item.kGTx0Ri0Rx5IPpXJ]{Opening Accompaniment}

You take a -2 status penalty to attack rolls against the warded creature (or -1 on a success, or a +2 status bonus on a critical failure).

Effect: Warding Protection.name: Effect: Warding Protection
Effect: Warding Protection.description: You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to the saving throw.

Evoke Surge.name: Evoke Surge
Evoke Surge.description: You channel the static magical energies coursing through you into a massively boosted spell. Cast a Spell that deals damage, doesn't have a duration, and takes at most 2 actions to cast. You gain a status bonus to that spell's damage equal to twice the spell's rank.

Mirror Mirror.name: Mirror Mirror
Mirror Mirror.description:
Frequency once per day

Requirements You have forged a connection between two mirrors and are in physical contact with one of them.

Effect You activate the forged connection between two mirrors. For 5 minutes, the two mirrors become like a window. You can communicate through auditory or visual means with anyone on the other side of the mirror and can see through the mirror but you cannot otherwise affect the person or environment on the other side of the mirror in any way, unless you would be able to target that person or location without line of effect or line of sight. You can Dismiss this effect.

Still Standing.name: Still Standing
Still Standing.description:
Trigger You would gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} condition while you have the wounded condition

Effect You know how to stay standing in the face of death. You regain Hit Points equal to half your level and immediately increase your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded} condition by 1, or by 2 if the dying condition was the result of a critical hit or a critical failure on a save.
